analysis.description:
m10fanclub.startDate (/unique_chucks/37/0x74a31dc20802cb1e41201af055ce7dfcd31d291d.sol#109-110) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x74a31dc20802cb1e41201af055ce7dfcd31d291d.sol#212-224)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/37/0x74a31dc20802cb1e41201af055ce7dfcd31d291d.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/37/0x74a31dc20802cb1e41201af055ce7dfcd31d291d.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x74a31dc20802cb1e41201af055ce7dfcd31d291d.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
